subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Tuesday was the start of the 11-city tour to promote HBO’s $54.95 pay-per-view production of the Oscar De La Hoya-Floyd Mayweather Jr. bout on May 5.
snippet: Tuesday was the start of the 11-city tour to promote HBO’s $54.95 pay-per-view production of the Oscar De La Hoya-Floyd Mayweather Jr. bout on May 5.
